SEARCH
Package com.whatacook.cookers.service

Class ActivationService

java.lang.Object
com.whatacook.cookers.service.ActivationService
@Service public class ActivationService extends Object
Service class for handling activation-related operations.

Annotations: - @Slf4j: Enables logging. - @AllArgsConstructor: Generates a constructor with 1 parameter for each field. - @Service: Indicates that this class is a Spring service.

Fields: - DAO: The activation data access object for interacting with the database.

Methods: - createNew(UserDto userDTO): Creates a new activation entry for a given user. - findById(String id): Finds an activation entry by its ID. - findByCode(String code): Finds an activation entry by its code and logs the result. - deleteById(String id): Deletes an activation entry by its ID.

Author:
Fauno Guazina
